HYDROGEN One
Media Machine

RED HYDROGEN One

Basis partnered with RED to develop a responsive website and Android mobile for the launch of the world's first 4-view Meida MAchine

Basis was responsible for tech & development of the e-commerce site when the HYDROGEN One first hit the international market - available via partnerships with AT&T, Verizon, and Telcel.

[ Video Goes Here ]

Additionaly, Basis built HYDROGEN One's entertainment network, dedicated to providing device owners with exclusive 4-view content.

Available as an Android App, Basis also architected an extensive back-end admin to provide content owners and studios with tools to manage titles, monetization, and metrics tied to their entertainment offerings.

Ohio Work Detail
California Cryobank
World's Largest Donor Database

California Cryobnk

Suite of Reproductive Service Web Properties & Customer Databases, Branding & Collateral

California Cryobank, an international reproductive and life sciences company, contacted us for a quick reboot of a handful of web pages. Noticing a variety of limitations with their technology, we suggested a full audit of their web properties. Our audit found many areas in which their technologies had potential to boost their business

After interviewing key stakeholders and executives to round out an encompassing audit, we stabilized their properties by rebuilding their application to accomodate current standards, redesigning their website to be responsive with a modern look, and creating a

data warehouse to store all customer information and marketing material.

Our partnership has delivered a yearly savings of nearly 50% on CCB's budget and contributed a to 5x increase in work output. Now considered a strategic partner, we continue to advise them in all aspects of their dgital businee- including SEO, analysis and design/development.
